content:
In the context of the cooperation between Heilbronn University and the Center for Med. Informatics in Chile (CENS) we are currently looking for interested professionals with experience in the field of HealthProviderIndexes.
Currently we are planning a meeting which will take place in Santiago de Chile at the end of September where international experts will be invited. Chile is currently about to create a first concept for a national HPI, and would like to exchange with other international experts as part of a meeting.
If you are interested simply send me a message.
Chile is nearly as far away from everywhere as Australia....
